suggested_prevention: Increase the task timeout limit or optimize the task to run within the allotted time.
Ensure all required dependencies are installed and correctly version‑locked before task execution.
Validate input data against the expected schema prior to launching the task; add schema checks in the pre‑flight stage.
Allocate sufficient compute resources or adjust quota limits; implement graceful back‑off and retry logic.
Add retry with exponential back‑off for calls to external services and implement circuit‑breaker patterns.
Verify that the executing user/service account has the necessary permissions for all accessed resources.
